description:
Survival Game Club advisor Sakura-sensei, the teacher who summons storms, thoughtlessly promises to exterminate a hornet`s nest.
Cheeky grade school student Haguro challenges the girls to a survival game battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Elle arrive ! La catastrophe ambulante débarque ! - Elle arrive aussi ! Le défi de la petite diablesse !
She`s Coming! The Woman Who Summons Storms Appears!! / She`s Coming, Too! The Challenge of Hell`s Children!!
Yatsu ga Kuru! Arashi o Yobu Onna Toujou!! / Yatsu mo Kuru! Hell`s Children no Chousen!!
ヤツが来る! 嵐を呼ぶ女登場!! / ヤツも来る! ヘルズチルドレンの挑戦!!
